```{r}
#Add libraries
library(tidyverse)
library(ggplot2)
library(dplyr)
library(readxl)
library(data.table)
```

Individual Level Data:

```{r}
#read in data and remove motion change rows
z <- read_excel("~/Desktop/Spring 2021/Capstone/zs_r.xlsx")
z <- z %>% 
  filter(!time_stamp %like% "###") %>% 
  filter(distance != 999999)
```


```{r}
#read in data and remove motion change rows
s <- read_excel("~/Desktop/Spring 2021/Capstone/ss_r.xlsx")
s <- s %>% 
  filter(!time_stamp %like% "###") %>%
  filter(distance != 999999)
```


```{r}
#read in data and remove motion change rows
v <- read_excel("~/Desktop/Spring 2021/Capstone/vs_r.xlsx")
v <- v %>% 
  filter(!time_stamp %like% "###") %>%
  filter(distance != 999999)

```


```{r}
df <- rbind(v, s, z)
```

Individual Interactions:

```{r}
z_s <- df %>% filter(name == 'Zeke') %>% filter(other_device == 'c0:98:e5:42:01:03')
```
